SELECT orders.sale_order_id,orders.sale_order_name,kh.Customer_Name,emp.emp_name,kh.Customer_Company,orders.sale_order_amount,srt.return_amount,SUM(cp.bmount_moeny) AS sumbmount_moeny,rp.receipt_money,orders.transaction_date,orders.`create_date` FROM `sale_order` orders LEFT JOIN `employee` emp ON orders.emp_id = emp.emp_id LEFT JOIN `collection_period` cp ON cp.`sale_order_id` = orders.sale_order_id LEFT JOIN `collection_record` cr ON cr.collection_id = cp.collection_id LEFT JOIN `record_static` st ON st.record_static_id = cr.record_static_id LEFT JOIN `receipt` rp ON rp.collection_id = cp.`collection_id` LEFT JOIN `customer` kh ON kh.Customer_Id = orders.Customer_Id LEFT JOIN `sale_return` srt ON srt.sale_order_id = orders.sale_order_id ORDER BY orders.`create_date` DESC
